title: 39 - Kind of Loco
description: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia have their protective eyewear on to talk about Charles Albright, the Texas Eyeball Killer. Then they tackle the notorious and tall Co-ed Killer, Ed Kemper.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
